column4: Using udfstools/mkudffs, how can I add a "title" when creating a UDF image; "title" meaning the string that displays as the drive when the cd is inserted.
Or does anyone know what that disc label is called? It's the equivalent of mkisofs -V "this label"
just look at the man page, it's --vid or --lvid
yeah, I saw that, but wasn't sure which. Wanted to dblcheck before creating and burning.
